title: Broken pickaxe (mithril)

properties.name: description
properties.value: A broken mithril pickaxe was a mithril pickaxe that had been broken by an exploding rock. It could be fixed at Nurmof's Pickaxe Shop in the Dwarven Mine for 43 coins.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Broken pickaxe (mithril)
 Broken pickaxe (mithril) was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.
Broken pickaxe

A broken mithril pickaxe was a mithril pickaxe that had been broken by an exploding rock. It could be fixed at Nurmof's Pickaxe Shop in the Dwarven Mine for 43 coins.

If the broken pickaxe was equipped before being broken, it would remain in the weapon slot. Once unequipped, it could not be equipped again.

After an update on 11 September 2014 making random events optional, all existing broken pickaxes were automatically repaired.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
9 – 16 October 2014

The item was graphically updated.

11 September 2014
(update)

The item's value was decreased from 43 to 1.

29 March 2004
(update)

The item became permanently available with the launch of RuneScape 2.

2 February 2004
(update)

The item was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta.
